metadata.title: CVE-2024-30171 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bouncy Castle Java TLS API and JSSE Providerbefore 1.78. Timing-based leakage may occur in RSA based handshakes becauseof exception processing.

criterions.comment: bouncycastle package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
